summary: This is an email from an FBI Special Agent in the Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad in New York, informing a recipient that a true bill (indictment) has been obtained and that the process of securing a GPS warrant is underway. It relates to the investigation of Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The email's subject line indicates the communication is about Ghislaine Maxwell, who was under investigation by the FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad.

events.title: True Bill Obtained and GPS Warrant Process Initiated
events.description: An FBI Special Agent reports that a true bill (grand jury indictment) has been obtained and the process of getting a GPS warrant is underway, related to the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation.

keyFacts: A true bill (grand jury indictment) was obtained in the Ghislaine Maxwell case as of June 29, 2020.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad (C-20) in New York was actively pursuing a GPS warrant related to the investigation.
The email indicates an ongoing, active phase of the investigation involving electronic surveillance.
